name: Ext_R4_ResearchSubject_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ResearchSubject.status for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: candidate | eligible | follow-up | ineligible | not-registered | off-study | on-study | on-study-intervention | on-study-observation | pending-on-study | potential-candidate | screening | withdrawn
element.definition: The current state of the subject.
element.comment: `ResearchSubject.status` maps to R5 `ResearchSubject.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: candidate | eligible | follow-up | ineligible | not-registered | off-study | on-study | on-study-intervention | on-study-observation | pending-on-study | potential-candidate | screening | withdrawn
element.definition: The current state of the subject.
element.comment: `ResearchSubject.status` maps to R5 `ResearchSubject.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Indicates the progression of a study subject through a study.
